long_description: sarker net is a btrc government licensed internet service provider company in sirajganj,sarker net ( sn ) has been one of the leading internet service providers in sirajganj, bangladesh. at sarker net ( sn ) we are committed to providing the highest quality services to you. we provide next generation internet service for home and corporate users according to the need of customer's aspiration. we have 11 years experienced and expert team to provide any solutions about broadband internet connectivity within a short time. we are currently serving more than 100 corporate customer and more than 7,000 home users. sarker net is a internet service provider having license from bangladesh telecommunications regulatory commission (btrc). we offer broadband internet and private data communication solutions over fiber optic, wireless and satellite technology through out the country. sarker net with its state-of-the-art redundant backbone infrastructure assures 100% uptime while providing ultimate clients satisfaction no matter how small a client may be.
